title: Transfer PC to Phone Browsing Tabs
body: There is a feature for transferring phone tabs to PC browser,  but the reason I downloaded the app, was to transfer PC tabs to my phone.

comments.body: I already have Edge browser on my phone, which supports sending tabs to my desktop, I think it's only a natural conclusion that you should be able to send tabs to your phone.
I often share my links with friends and family via SMS...  not having this options forces me to browse more from my phone than a windows PC... I would love to have this feature!
would be awesome to have that… like i mean… i sometimes need to continue reading something while doing my "toilet routine" :D
I was a little disappointed to see this wasn't a feature already too. Would be great to be able to throw a tab over to my phone to test the mobile display of sites.
